template_input_params.name: ibm_stack_name
template_input_params.description: A unique stack name.
template_input_params.label: A unique stack name.

template_input_params.description: AWS AMI Owner ID
template_input_params.label: AWS AMI Owner ID

template_input_params.name: aws_region
template_input_params.description: AWS Region Name
template_input_params.label: AWS Region Name

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_root_block_device_delete_on_termination
template_input_params.description: AWS Root Block Device Delete on Termination
template_input_params.label: AWS Root Block Device Delete on Termination

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_root_block_device_volume_size
template_input_params.description: AWS Root Block Device Volume Size
template_input_params.label: AWS Root Block Device Volume Size

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_root_block_device_volume_type
template_input_params.description: AWS Root Block Device Volume Type
template_input_params.label: AWS Root Block Device Volume Type

template_input_params.name: aws_sg_camc_name
template_input_params.description: AWS Security Group Name
template_input_params.label: AWS Security Group Name

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_subnet_name
template_input_params.description: AWS Subnet Name
template_input_params.label: AWS Subnet Name

template_input_params.name: aws_vpc_name
template_input_params.description: AWS VPC Name
template_input_params.label: AWS VPC Name

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_associate_public_ip_address
template_input_params.description: AWS assign a public IP to instance
template_input_params.label: AWS assign a public IP to instance

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_das_password
template_input_params.description: DB2 Administration Server (DAS) password
template_input_params.label: DB2 DAS user password - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 8 to 32 printable ASCII characters except space.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_das_username
template_input_params.description: DB2 Administration Server (DAS) username
template_input_params.label: DB2 DAS username - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 8 lower-case letters, digits and _(underscore) for names (1) not same as users, admins, guests, public, local and any SQL reserved words; (2) not starting with digits and special words as ibm, sys, sql and dbm.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_fcm_port
template_input_params.description: The port for the DB2 Fast Communications Manager (FCM).
template_input_params.label: DB2 FCM port - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow a number between 60000 and 69998.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_base_version
template_input_params.description: The base version of DB2 to install. Set to none if installing from fix package.
template_input_params.label: DB2 base version - DB2Node01

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_codeset
template_input_params.description: Codeset is used by the database manager to determine codepage parameter values.
template_input_params.label: DB2 codeset - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow codesets defined in https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSEPGG_11.1.0/com.ibm.db2.luw.admin.nls.doc/doc/r0004565.html.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_db_collate
template_input_params.description: Collate determines ordering for a set of characters.
template_input_params.label: DB2 collate - DB2Node01

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_port
template_input_params.description: The port to connect to the DB2 instance.
template_input_params.label: DB2 connection port - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow a number between 50000 and 59999.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_db_data_path
template_input_params.description: Specifies the DB2 database data path.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database data path - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow a string that starts with slash.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_update_NEWLOGPATH
template_input_params.description: The path to be used for database logging.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database log path - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow default or a string that starts with slash.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_db_name
template_input_params.description: The name of the database to be created.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database name - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 8 alphanumeric characters starting withnot a number or the letter sequences SYS, DBM, or IBM.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_db_path
template_input_params.description: Specifies the DB2 database path.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database path - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow a string that starts with slash.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_users_db_user1_ldap_user
template_input_params.description: This parameter indicates whether the database user is stored in LDAP. If the value set to true, the user is not created on the operating system.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database user LDAP - DB2Node01

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_users_db_user1_user_access
template_input_params.description: The database access granted to the user. Example: DBADM WITH DATAACCESS WITHOUT ACCESSCTRL
template_input_params.label: DB2 database user access - DB2Node01

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_users_db_user1_user_gid
template_input_params.description: Specifies the name of the operating system group for database users.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database user group name - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 32 lower-case letters, digits and _(underscore) for names (1) not same as users, admins, guests, public, local and any SQL reserved words; (2) not starting with digits and special words as ibm, sys, and sql.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_users_db_user1_user_home
template_input_params.description: The DB2 database user home directory.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database user home directory - DB2Node01

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_users_db_user1_user_name
template_input_params.description: The user name to be granted database access.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database user name - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 8 lower-case letters, digits and _(underscore) for names (1) not same as users, admins, guests, public, local and any SQL reserved words; (2) not starting with digits and special words as ibm, sys, sql and dbm.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_users_db_user1_user_password
template_input_params.description: The password for the database user name.
template_input_params.label: DB2 database user password - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 8 to 32 printable ASCII characters except space.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_update_FAILARCHPATH
template_input_params.description: The path to be used for archiving log files.
template_input_params.label: DB2 failover log archive path - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow default or a string that starts with slash.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_fenced_groupname
template_input_params.description: The group name for the DB2 fenced user.
template_input_params.label: DB2 fenced group name - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 32 lower-case letters, digits and _(underscore) for names (1) not same as users, admins, guests, public, local and any SQL reserved words; (2) not starting with digits and special words as ibm, sys, and sql.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_fenced_password
template_input_params.description: The password for the DB2 fenced username.
template_input_params.label: DB2 fenced user password - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 8 to 32 printable ASCII characters except space.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_fenced_username
template_input_params.description: The fenced user is used to run user defined functions and stored procedures outside of the address space used by the DB2 database.
template_input_params.label: DB2 fenced username - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 8 lower-case letters, digits and _(underscore) for names (1) not same as users, admins, guests, public, local and any SQL reserved words; (2) not starting with digits and special words as ibm, sys, sql and dbm.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_fp_version
template_input_params.description: The version of DB2 fix pack to install. If no fix pack is required, set this value the same as DB2 base version.
template_input_params.label: DB2 fix pack version - DB2Node01

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_install_dir
template_input_params.description: The directory to install DB2. Recommended: /opt/ibm/db2/V<db2_version>
template_input_params.label: DB2 installation directory - DB2Node01

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_instance_dir
template_input_params.description: The DB2 instance directory stores all information that pertains to a database instance.
template_input_params.label: DB2 instance directory - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow default or a string that starts with slash.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_instance_groupname
template_input_params.description: The group name for the DB2 instance user.
template_input_params.label: DB2 instance group name - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 32 lower-case letters, digits and _(underscore) for names (1) not same as users, admins, guests, public, local and any SQL reserved words; (2) not starting with digits and special words as ibm, sys, and sql.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_instance_prefix
template_input_params.description: Specifies the DB2 instance prefix
template_input_params.label: DB2 instance prefix - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 8 alphanumeric characters starting withnot a number or the letter sequences SYS, DBM, or IBM.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_instance_type
template_input_params.description: The type of DB2 instance to create.
template_input_params.label: DB2 instance type - DB2Node01

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_instance_password
template_input_params.description: The password for the DB2 instance username.
template_input_params.label: DB2 instance user password - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 8 to 32 printable ASCII characters except space.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_instance_username
template_input_params.description: The DB2 instance username controls all DB2 processes and owns all filesystems and devices.
template_input_params.label: DB2 instance username - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow 1 to 8 lower-case letters, digits and _(underscore) for names (1) not same as users, admins, guests, public, local and any SQL reserved words; (2) not starting with digits and special words as ibm, sys, sql and dbm.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_update_LOGFILSIZ
template_input_params.description: Specifies the size of log files.
template_input_params.label: DB2 log file size - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow a number between 4 and 16777152 or using default.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_pagesize
template_input_params.description: Specifies the page size in bytes.
template_input_params.label: DB2 page size - DB2Node01

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_update_LOGARCHMETH1
template_input_params.description: Specifies the media type of the primary destination for logs that are archived.
template_input_params.label: DB2 primary log archive method - DB2Node01

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_database_update_LOGSECOND
template_input_params.description: Specifies the number of secondary log files that are created and used for recovery log files.
template_input_params.label: DB2 secondary log files - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow a number between -1 and 254 or using default.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01_db2_instances_instance1_databases_database1_territory
template_input_params.description: Territory is used by the database manager when processing data that is territory sensitive.
template_input_params.label: DB2 territory - DB2Node01
template_input_params.regexdesc: Allow two upper-case letters and a special case (Lat) as defined in https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSEPGG_11.1.0/com.ibm.db2.luw.admin.nls.doc/doc/r0004565.html.

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01-flavor
template_input_params.description: DB2Node01 Flavor
template_input_params.label: DB2Node01 Flavor

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_access_token
template_input_params.description: IBM Pattern Manager Access Token
template_input_params.label: IBM Pattern Manager Access Token

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_service
template_input_params.description: IBM Pattern Manager Service
template_input_params.label: IBM Pattern Manager Service

template_input_params.name: ibm_sw_repo_password
template_input_params.description: IBM Software Repo Password
template_input_params.label: IBM Software Repo Password

template_input_params.name: ibm_sw_repo
template_input_params.description: IBM Software Repo Root (https://<hostname>:<port>)
template_input_params.label: IBM Software Repo Root

template_input_params.name: ibm_sw_repo_user
template_input_params.description: IBM Software Repo Username
template_input_params.label: IBM Software Repo Username

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01-image
template_input_params.description: Operating system image id / template that should be used when creating the virtual image
template_input_params.label: Operating System ID / Template - DB2Node01

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01-os_admin_user
template_input_params.description: Name of the admin user account in the virtual machine that will be accessed via SSH
template_input_params.label: Operating System Username - DB2Node01

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01-name
template_input_params.description: Short hostname of virtual machine
template_input_params.label: Short hostname - DB2Node01

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_private_ssh_key
template_input_params.description: Private CAMC SSH key (base64 encoded) used to connect to the virtual guest.
template_input_params.label: Private CAMC SSH key (base64 encoded) used to connect to the virtual guest. - ssh_keys

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_public_ssh_key_name
template_input_params.description: Public CAMC SSH key name used to connect to the virtual guest.
template_input_params.label: Public CAMC SSH key name used to connect to the virtual guest. - ssh_keys

template_input_params.name: DB2Node01-mgmt-network-public
template_input_params.description: Expose and use public IP of virtual machine for internal communication
template_input_params.label: Use Public Management Network

template_input_params.name: user_public_ssh_key
template_input_params.description: User defined public SSH key used to connect to the virtual machine. The format must be in openSSH.
template_input_params.label: User Public SSH Key - ssh_keys

template_input_params.name: runtime_domain
template_input_params.description: domain name
template_input_params.label: domain name

template_output_params.label: IP Addresss
template_output_params.description: The Public and Public IP address
